articleName: The 'religion' of Mozart's Requiem and aesthetic autonomy in its early reception
[1770] Giovenale Sacchi on Mozart the prodigy
descriptions: Brief entry concerning a book by Sacchi and the Mozarts' connection to it
Please note: I am not the author of this article. I am credited (and my work is cited), as a portion of the content is derived from an appendix in my master's thesis. The entry is by Dr David Black.

articleName: Fanfares, fundamentals and affiliations in the late music of György Ligeti
